list.fullName: Models of the Particulate Nature of Matter

children.name: Structure 1 All
children.description: All Questions in Structure 1 Models of the Particulate Nature of Matter

children.name: S1.1 - Introduction to the Particulate Nature of Matter
children.description: Elements, Compounds, Mixtures, Separation Techniques, Kinetic Molecular Theory, Changes of States

children.name: S1.2 - The Nuclear Atom
children.description: Atomic Structure, Subatomic Particles, Isotopes, Atomic Number, Mass Number

children.name: S1.3 - Electron Configurations
children.description: Hydrogen Emission Spectra, Wavelength, Frequency, Energy, Full & Condensed Electron Configuration, Orbital Diagram

children.name: S1.4 - The Mole
children.description: Moles, Mass, Molar Mass, Relative Atomic Mass, Relative Formula Mass, Empirical vs Molecular Formulas, Avogadro's Law

children.name: S1.5 - Ideal Gases
children.description: Ideal Gases, Real Gases' Deviation, Molar Volume, Ideal Gas Equation, Combined Gas Law

children.name: Structure 2 All
children.description: All Questions in Structure 2 Models of Bonding & Structure

children.name: S2.1 - The Ionic Model
children.description: Ionic Bond, Ionic Compounds, Polyatomic Ions

children.name: S2.2 - The Covalent Model
children.description: Covalent & Coordination Bonds, Octet Rule, Lewis Formula, VSEPR, Bond & Molecular Polarities, IMF, Chromatography

children.name: S2.3 - The Metallic Model
children.description: Metallic Bond (Definition & Strength), Metals (Conductivity, Malleability, Melting Points Trend)

children.name: S2.4 - From Models to Materials
children.description: Bonding & Properties of a Material, Bonding Triangle, Alloys, Natural & Synthetic Polymers, Polymerization Reactions

children.name: Structure 3 All
children.description: All Questions in Structure 3 Classification of Matter

children.name: S3.1 - The Periodic Table - Classification of Elements
children.description: Atomic & Ionic Radii, Ionization Energy, Electron Affinity, Electronegativity, Metallic & Non-Metallic, Oxidation States

children.name: S3.2 - Functional Groups - Classification of Organic Compounds
children.description: Organic Compounds, Functional Groups, Homologous Series, IUPAC Nomenclature, Structural Isomers

children.name: Reactivity 1 All
children.description: All Questions in Reactivity 1 What Drives Chemical Reactions?

children.name: R1.1 - Measuring Enthalpy Changes
children.description: Endothermic & Exothermic Reactions, Energy Profiles, Standard Enthalpy Change Calculations

children.name: R1.2 - Energy Cycles in Reactions
children.description: Bond Enthalpy, Hess's Law

children.name: R1.3 - Energy From Fuels
children.description: Complete & Incomplete Combustion, Fossil Fuels, Greenhouse Effect, Biofuels, Renewable & Non-renewable Energy, Fuel Cell

list.name: Reactivity 2
list.fullName: How Much, How Fast & How Far?

children.name: Reactivity 2 All
children.description: All Questions in Reactivity 2 How Much, How Fast & How Far?

children.name: R2.1 - The Amount of Chemical Change
children.description: Stoichiometry, Mole Ratio, Limiting Reactant, Theoretical Yield, Percentage Yield, Experimental Yield, Atom Economy

children.name: R2.2 - The Rate of Chemical Change
children.description: Rate of Reaction, Collision Theory, Activation Energy, Catalysts, Maxwell-Boltzmann Energy Distribution Curves

children.name: R2.3 - The Extent of Chemical Change
children.description: Dynamic Equilibrium, Equilibrium Constant, Le Châtelier's Principle

children.name: Reactivity 3 All
children.description: All Questions in Reactivity 3 Mechanisms of Chemical Change

children.name: R3.1 - Proton Transfer Reactions
children.description: Brønsted–Lowry Acids & Bases, Conjugate Acid–Base Pair, pH Scale, Kw, Neutralization, pH Curves for Strong Acids & Bases

children.name: R3.2 - Electron Transfer Reactions
children.description: Oxidation, Reduction, Voltaic, Secondary & Electrolytic Cells, Oxidation & Reduction of Functional Groups

children.name: R3.3 - Electron Sharing Reactions
children.description: Radical, Homolytic Fission, Initiation, Substitution Reactions With Alkanes (Propagation, Termination)

children.name: R3.4 - Electron-pair Sharing Reactions
children.description: Nucleophile, Electrophile, Nucleophilic Substitution, Heterolytic Fission, Electrophilic Addition
